data.title: Tiara Consulting Services, Inc.
data.text:
ï»¿ï»¿Tiara Participated in Oracle NetSuite Suite World 2017 (#SW17):

Apr 24-25 2017: As a NetSuite Partner, Tiara participated in the NetSuite SuiteWorld 2017 conference at Las Vegas during April 24-27, 2017 to strengthened its NetSuite Practice capabilities and promote with new prospective clients who attended the conference.

Â

Creator Certified Solution Provider: Next Level of Zoho Partnership

Jan 05,Â 2015: After evaluating Tiara's experience / capabilities in successfully building custom business applications using Zoho Creator, our alliance partner Zoho has certified us as a Creator Certified Solution Provider (CCSP).

As a CCSP, Tiara gets positioned as a leader in Zoho Creator platform and also become part of Zoho Creator Developer community. This certification strengthens Tiara's Zoho Practice and helps to accelerate our company's business growth.

ï»¿Netsuite Solution Provider: Strengthening Netsuite Partnership

Nov 20,Â 2014: Tiara has been recognized by Netsuite as a Netsuite Solution Provider, the highest level of partnership that allows Tiara to perform end-to-end implementation of Netsuite, a cloud based ERP system. This elevated level of partnership strengthens Tiara's Netsuite practice and helps to accelerate the organization's business growth in the ERP space.

Tiara exhibits in SMB Dallas Expo

Apr 15,Â 2014: Tiara exhibited its capabilities to attract prospective clients in Dallas by participating in the SMB (Small & Medium Business) Expo held at Dallas Convention Center.

Â

Tiara strengthens MS Partnershipï»¿

ï»¿May 01, 2013: Tiara team is excited on upgrading Microsoft partnership to SILVER Application Development level through its proven experience and capabilities in executing projects involving Microsoft technologies.

Silicon India publishes cover story on Tiara: March 2012 Edition

MarÂ 2012: Silicon India magazine has recognized Tiara again by publishing a cover story article onÂ Tiara in their March 2012 edition. The article highlights Tiara's approach of growing along with partners with customer and partner case studies.

http://www.siliconindia.com/magazine_articles/Tiara_Consulting_Growing_along_with_Partners-GNHJ263686730.htmlÂ

Â Tiara sponsor Pervasive Integration World 2012 Europe Conference

JanÂ 31, 2012: Tiara sponsored Pervasive Integration World 2012 Europe conference conducted at London Cumberland hotel. Tiara CEO made a presentation onÂ Integration Excellence across Diverse Markets and explained how TiaraÂ grew itsÂ integration solution business across diverse markets by delivering excellence using Pervasive Data Integrator as well asÂ adopting innovative serviceÂ models such as Pay-as-you-Go solution.Â

Tiara recognized by Silicon India as Top Notch niche Solution Provider

Dec 2011: Silicon India magazine has recognized Tiara by listing Tiara as part of SI100 for 2011,Â list ofÂ Top 100 IT companies for 2011.Â Please read the article below thatÂ talks more about Tiara being a Top NotchÂ niche IT solutions provider.

http://www.siliconindia.com/magazine_articles/Tiara_Consulting_Top_Notch_Niche_Service_Provider-RXDR92385403.htmlÂ

Â

Tiara partners with RightNow TechnologiesÂ

Dec 2011: Tiara has partnered with RightNow Technologies to market their RightNow CX (Customer Experience), SaaS (Software as a Service)Â basedÂ CRM product in the US market. This partnership helps Tiara to offer CRM solutions to its customers for improving their Customer Experience (CX), and it also helps Tiara to strengthen its CRM practice.

Tiara to exhibit at Dreamforce 2011 onÂ AugÂ 29 - Sep 02, 2011

AugÂ 29 - Sep 02, 2011: Tiara is aÂ proud Bronze sponsor of Dreamforce 2011, biggest cloud computing event of the year and annual conference of Salesforce.com users and developers. It is a five day packed session to be held at The Moscone Center in San FranciscoÂ fromÂ Aug 29 toÂ Sep 02, 2011.

Â

Tiara has a dedicated CRM practice focusing on implementation and customization ofÂ Salesforce.com applications (both SalesÂ and Service Cloud) as per customer needs, integrating Salesforce.com CRM data with external systems such as SAP R/3 using ETL tools like Pervasive Data Integrator that has ready-made connector for integrating data from Salesforce.com. Tiara is also a Value Added Reseller (VAR) of Salesforce.com in the US.

Â

Please visit our booth in Dreamforce atÂ booth #302 and we will share you ourÂ Salesforce.com CRM offerings, capabilities and experience.

Tiara exhibited atÂ Silicon India's BI Conference 2011 at all major cities in India

Â

JulyÂ 30, 2011: Tiara sponsored Silicon India's BI Conference for 2011 in all major cities namely Delhi, Pune,Â Chennai, Mumbai and Bangalore, and presented on "Innovative Data Integration: Foundation for Business Intelligence".

The innovationsÂ of Tiara's BI Practice were presented with demo of Pervasive Data Integrator, ETL tool and how it solves Data Integration challenges for the custmers. All the latest trends in Data Integration such as Cloud based Data Integration etc wereÂ presented to the audience. All the offerings and capabilities of Tiara wereÂ show cased in the booth provided at all the major cities.Â Â

Tiara exhibited at Dreamforce 2010 on Dec 6 - 9, 2010

Â Dec 06-09, 2010: TiaraÂ is an exhibiting sponsor of Dreamforce 2010,Â biggest cloud computing event of the year and annual conference of Salesforce.com users and developers. It is a four day packed session to be held atÂ The Moscone Center in SanÂ FranciscoÂ on December 06 - 09, 2010.

Tiara has a dedicated CRM practice focusing on implementation and customization of Salesforce.com CRM application as per customer needs, integrating Salesforce.com CRM data with external systems such as SAP R/3 using ETL tools like Pervasive Data Integrator that has ready-made connector for integrating data from Salesforce.com. Tiara is also a Value Added Reseller (VAR) of Salesforce.com in the US.

Please visit our booth in Dreamforce at Kiosk #31 and we will share youÂ our CRM practice offerings, capabilities and experience.

Â

TiaraÂ attendedÂ iNEXT 2010 -Â Annual Integration ConferenceÂ conducted by Pervasive at Austin, Texas.

Tiara has a dedicated CRM practice focusing on implementation and customization of Salesforce.com CRM aNovÂ 01-03, 2010: Tiara has joined industry's leading integration experts, partners, SIsÂ (System Integrators), SaaS vendors, ISVs, andÂ BSPs (Business Service Providers) of Pervasive at iNEXT 2010, annual conference hosted by Pervasive at Austin, TX. In this conference, Tiara met with key leaders, partners to share experiences in handling complex integration scenaries and learnt from others too.Â Please visit the following link to learnÂ more on the conference: www.integrationext.com

TiaraÂ attendedÂ Metamorphosis 2010 - Executive Summit sponsored by Pervasive at Silicon Valley (San Jose, CA).

Â

May 05-06, 2010: Tiara joined a wide range ofÂ industry leaders, partners, SIs (System Integrators), SaaS vendors, ISVs and BSPs (Business Service Providers)Â in Metamorphosis 2010, Executive Summit sponsored by Pervasive Software at San Jose, CA.Â This summitÂ helped Tiara to meet with industry leaders in SaaS, Cloud Computing and learn how to strategically grow businesses by leveraging agile integration. Please visit the following link to learn more about this summit: www.metamorphosis2010.com. Here are some team pictures taken at the Summit:

Tiara Team: (L-R) Abitha Balu (Director, Operations), Vengadesh Ramakrishnan (Regional Manager, Asia Pacific), Venkatesh Babu (President and CEO).

Tiara Team with Lance Speck, Sr. Director, Integration Sales at Pervasive (Third from Left).

Tiara Team with Greg Coates, Product Manager at Pervasive (Third from Left).

Dinner with Pervasive Management (Bill Humphrey, Director (3rd from Right), Kenneth Clore, ManagerÂ (4th from Right)) and executives of MDP Partners for Japan and China regions.

Â

Â

Pervasive has chosen us as their Market Development PartnerÂ (MDP) for India

October 2009: Our customer, Pervasive Software, a global leader in embedded data management and data integration software provider, has chosenÂ usÂ asÂ their market development partner (MDP) for India. Under this MDP role, Tiara will facilitate the marketing and sales of Pervasive Data Integration productsÂ (Pervasive Data Integrator (PDI), Pervasive Data Profiler etc), implements data integration solutions using PDI and provides domestic Help Desk support onÂ PDI products for all customers in India. For more details about Pervasive and PDI, please refer to www.pervasive.com or www.pervasiveintegration.com

Please click the links below to viewÂ the press articles issued on US Business Wire and The Hindu, Chennai, India, on this partnership:

http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20091125005675/en

http://www.hindu.com/2009/11/28/stories/2009112857231600.htm
